info.title: CRM Associations
info.x-hubspot-api-use-case: When an existing contact has moved to a new company, update their associated company to keep your CRM up to date.
info.x-hubspot-introduction: Use the associations API to create, retrieve, update, or delete associations between records, or between records and activities.

post.description: Requests a report of all objects in the portal which have a high usage of associations
Batch delete specific association labels for objects. Deleting an unlabeled association will also delete all labeled associations between those two objects

Batch read associations for objects to specific object type. The 'after' field in a returned paging object  can be added alongside the 'id' to retrieve the next page of associations from that objectId. The 'link' field is deprecated and should be ignored. Note: The 'paging' field will only be present if there are more pages and absent otherwise.
Create the default (most generic) association type between two object types

put.description: Set association labels between two records.

delete.description: deletes all associations between two records.

get.description: List all associations of an object by object type. Limit 500 per call.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: The paging cursor token of the last successfully read resource will be returned as the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to display per page.

put.description: Create the default (most generic) association type between two object types
